de.uniulm.omi.cloudiator.sword.api.remote

Interface RemoteConnectionFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractOverthereConnectionFactory, OverthereDecidingConnectionFactory, OverthereSSHConnectionFactory, OverthereWinRMConnectionFactory

    public interface RemoteConnectionFactory
    Created by Daniel Seybold on 06.05.2015.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RemoteConnection createRemoteConnection(String remoteAddress, OSFamily osFamily, LoginCredential loginCredential, int port)
      Creates a RemoteConnection to a remote host.

    • Method Detail

      • createRemoteConnection

        RemoteConnection createRemoteConnection(String remoteAddress,
                                        OSFamily osFamily,
                                        LoginCredential loginCredential,
                                        int port)
                                 throws RemoteException
        Creates a RemoteConnection to a remote host.
        Parameters:
        remoteAddress - the address of the remote machine
        osFamily - the operating system family of the remote
        loginCredential - the login credentials for login.
        port - the specific port for opening a RemoteConnection.
        Returns:
        a connection to the remote machine.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the login credential misses username, and one of password or private key.
        RemoteException - if it was not possible to establish the connection.
